definition: (golf) the unit of scoring in golf is the act of hitting the ball with a club, treat gingerly or carefully
details:
noun
- (golf) the unit of scoring in golf is the act of hitting the ball with a club
= example: (golf) the unit of scoring in golf is the act of hitting the ball with a club
- a sudden loss of consciousness resulting when the rupture or occlusion of a blood vessel leads to oxygen lack in the brain
= synonyms: apoplexy, cerebrovascular accident
- a light touch with the hands
= synonyms: stroking
- a single complete movement
- the act of swinging or striking at a ball with a club or racket or bat or cue or hand
= example: the act of swinging or striking at a ball with a club or racket or bat or cue or hand
= synonyms: shot
- any one of the repeated movements of the limbs and body used for locomotion in swimming or rowing
- a mark made on a surface by a pen, pencil, or paintbrush
= example: a mark made on a surface by a pen, pencil, or paintbrush
- a punctuation mark (/) used to separate related items of information
= synonyms: diagonal, slash, solidus, separatrix
- anything that happens suddenly or by chance without an apparent cause
= synonyms: accident, fortuity, chance event
- the maximum movement available to a pivoted or reciprocating piece by a cam
= synonyms: throw
- a light touch
- the oarsman nearest the stern of the shell who sets the pace for the rest of the crew
verb
- treat gingerly or carefully
= example: treat gingerly or carefully
- strike a ball with a smooth blow
- row at a particular rate
- touch lightly and repeatedly, as with brushing motions
= example: touch lightly and repeatedly, as with brushing motions
